page.title: 16Ballingry - Atmosphere (2)
page.content: If you don't feel like making chips you just go along to the chip shop. The chippy is nearly always busy. It is very noisy with people shouting, the sizzling of greasy chips and the sound of Space Invaders. You have to wait in a queue. The smell of onions and vinegar tingles your taste buds. John Campbell(11) It is mostly women who go to the Bingo because the men go to the club. The hall is noisy and smoky and you have to have your own pen. When the Bingo is finished, you see people waiting at the bus stop or hurrying up the road to watch 'Dallas'. David,Heather and Lorraine (10) My gran goes to the Bingo on Tuesdays in Lochore Institute. She gets dressed up and takes her handbag. I don't think she has missed a Bingo night. Louise Herron (11)
